title: hardest bots
body: LOL THOSE BOTS ARE BUGGED THEY KNOW WHEN I TRY TO SNIPE THEM IN THE BUSH OR FLASH ON MY E (JINX) AND DONT GET STUNNED RIOT FIX YOUR BOTS

replies.body: Were you fighting a Jax?  He might have been using his dodge ability, but he also had Mercury Treads which would give him slow reduction.  Fighting against a real Jax player can feel like you're eating a cactus, so I can't imagine a bot being much easier.  When he starts spinning that lamppost, do what I do.  Run!
